definition: Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)

sentences.english: Dragon, but also as a "black dragon", the ancient Oriental myth of the god.
sentences.chinese: 青龍，亦作“蒼龍”，古代神話中的東方之神。

sentences.english: Black Dragon gorge will become china famous scenic sport of outdoor exercises with its unique charm.
sentences.chinese: 蒼龍峽正以其獨特的魅力成爲中國戶外運動的勝地。

definition: luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)
Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
eta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
